projects.name: College Management System
projects.desc: manages college activities with users: teacher, students and admin. Students can check view appointments and notes.

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.desc: manages hospital activities having multiple users: doctor, patients and admin and lab. Patients can book appointment and check their reports.

projects.name: Expense Tracker App
projects.desc: manages expenses and income of users. Users can add, edit and delete their expenses and income. Users can also check their balance and expenses in different categories.

projects.name: Crowd Funding App
projects.desc: a platform where people can raise funds. Users can donate to projects and can also create their own projects using ethereum blockchain technology.

projects.name: Portfolio Site
projects.desc: It is my portfolio site. It is replica for my cv, it is more interactive and responsive than cv. It is made using react js and pure css.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.desc: It is a clone of spotify. It is made using react js and firebase. It is responsive only for web browsers.
